title: Crime Bible-The Five Lessons of Blood-52 Aftermath
description:
Crime Bible - The Five Lessons of Blood - 52 Aftermath

Renee Montoya as the Question

A Monk of the Dark Faith is moving through the DCU, seeding evil in his wake as he prepares for a final, potentially devastating act. Trailing him is The Question, who seeks to save the life of the author of a best-selling expose about the Dark Faith. - See more at: http://www.dccomics.com/graphic-novels/the-question-the-five-books-of-blood-0#sthash.JtyKubzg.dpuf
